items.title: Corporate U.S. Clean Energy Purchases Near 120 GW, Driven By AI Datacenter Boom
items.description: The rise of AI has caused expectations for datacenter electricity demand to skyrocket since the unveiling of ChatGPT in the fall of 2022, prompting a rush toward clean energy purchases.

items.title: Interested in Quantum Computing Investing? Here Are 4 Fantastic Picks to Maximize Your Odds of Picking a Winner
items.author: The Motley Fool
items.description: The article discusses the quantum computing race and recommends a basket investing approach to capitalize on this trend. It highlights four companies - Alphabet, Microsoft, IonQ, and D-Wave - and their recent breakthroughs in the field.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article highlights Alphabet's recent launch of its Willow quantum computing chip, which made progress in solving the accuracy problem in quantum computing.
The article highlights Alphabet's recent launch of its Willow quantum computing chip, which made progress in solving the accuracy problem in quantum computing.
The article mentions Microsoft's creation of a new state of matter to better control particles and improve the accuracy of its Majorana 1 quantum chip.
The article notes that IonQ has landed the largest quantum computing contract and is already selling commercially viable quantum computers.

The article highlights that D-Wave is already selling commercially viable quantum computers, including the world's largest with 5,000 qubits.
